VirtualDub MSU Old Cinema Filter 2.0
This filter is intended to achieve an "Old cinema" effect
VirtualDub MSU Noise Generation Filter
The filter adds artificial noise of one common types (equidistributed, normally distributed, colour stains, echo signal) to video stream
VirtualDub MSU Noise Estimation Filter
This filter is used to estimate mean noise variance in video sequences
VirtualDub MSU Motion Phase filter
Filter is intended for representation of moving object phases
VirtualDub MSU Motion Estimation Filter
The filter performs multiframe and singleframe motion estimation and compensation in a video stream
Photoshop MSU Image Restoration
The plug-in for image processing program Adobe Photoshop CS2
Grain-Degrain Project / Technology for removing and applying of film grain
We developed new methods of removing and applying of the film grain
AviSynth MSU Frame Rate Conversion Filter
The filter is intended for video frame rate up-conversion
MSU Digital TV Signal Enhancement
Fast and flexible algorithm for image denoising
VirtualDub MSU Deshaker filter
Results of MSU Deshaker filter
Depth Map Generation and Stereo video creation
This technology provides high quality depth map estimation for video
MSU Denoiser Filter
The filter is designed for noisy video stream processing, video quality improvement, or video preprocessing
MSU Deinterlacer / New MSU Full FPS High Quality Deinterlacer
We designed a new high quality de-interlacing algorithm. This is a full-fps de-interlacer
MSU-Samsung Deinterlacing Project (to deinterlace video)
The filter is designed to suppress comb effect, also known as interlacing, in motion pictures
VirtualDub MSU Deflicker filter
Filter is intended for processing video with flicker effect
VirtualDub MSU Deblocking Filter / Deblocking filter for reducing "blocking-artifact" in video data
Filter is intended for recovering quality of video ripped from DVD
VirtualDub MSU Smart Deblocking Filter
Filter automatically determines the blockiness' strength on the frame and in the concrete part of it, the processed video contains maximum details from the original video
Crazy gallery
We will explain what the filter does and what is wrong with its algorithm, because sometimes it is almost impossible to do even for professional
MSU Color Enhancement
MSU Color Enhancement filter
VirtualDub MSU Cartoonizer Filter / Converts Movies into Cartoons
Gallery of results obtained using VirtualDub MSU Cartoonizer Filter
MSU Cartoon Restore Filter
The filter is designed for quality improvement of compressed cartoons like video by deleting ringing artifacts
MSU Super-Precision Filter
Filter is intended for increasing the colour depth of video (bits per pixel) while preserving details and borders.
Options Analysis of MPEG-4 AVC/H.264 Codec x264
We have analyzed x264 (version r938) - one of the best codecs of MPEG-4 AVC/H.264 video coding standard.
x264 Codec Improvement
We decided to improve ABR rate control mode. In this mode codec tries to compress a film with target average bitrate.
